fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The caption to a picture of the Nepalese climber Nirmal Purja said he was “a former special forces soldier in the British army”. Though he was a British army Gurkha, the special forces unit he served in was the Special Boat Service, part of the Royal Navy (On top of the world: Nepalese climber scales 14 highest peaks in 189 days, 30 October, page 3). • Other recently corrected articles include: Met police accused of ‘degrading’ treatment of disabled XR activists Ardal O’Hanlon: ‘Comedy never used to be a career – it was for slackers with ukuleles’ Chile: protesters light bonfires and clash with police despite cabinet reshuffle
